about_the_game:
Take to the fight with Nemesis - Hell’s Highway, which transports the action to the infamous Hell’s Highway corridor, heavily contested during Market Garden in September 1944.

Take command as the multi-national British 43rd (Wessex) Infantry Division of the Allied XXX Corps with its attached Dutch Princess Irene Brigade and Polish paratroopers, or let your tank guns roar with the combined Kampfgruppe Walther and its heavy Panzerbrigade 107’s contingent of Panzer IV/70 tank destroyers.

Nemesis: Hell’s Highway is a community-voted Steel Division 2 DLC offering two brand-new battlegroups meticulously researched and expertly modeled. A host of unique new units, with new skins, voice lines, and weapon loadouts, await to be commanded in solo, coop, or multiplayer.

British 43rd (Wessex) Infantry Division

Deploying as the British 43rd (Wessex) Infantry Division during Operation Markt Garden along Hell’s Highway will see you not only count on the support of the Dutch Princess Irene Brigade and local resistance fighters but also paratroopers of the Polish Independent Airborne Brigade. Irregular Dutch BS Gids resistance fighters, Allied Dutch motorized Gevechtsgroepen and Marinier naval infantry detachments, British Assault Groups, and Polish airborne Spadochroniareze, are all available to this multi-national division. Next to plentiful British-operated vehicles, the Dutch bring their own Lynx and Humber LRC scout cars, Mitchell II bombers, and Spitfire Mk. XIV fighters.

The 43rd (Wessex) Infantry Division fights much like a mechanized formation exhibiting strong offensive firepower, including infantry, tank, and air forces.

Kampfgruppe Walther

The mixed Kampfgruppe Walther played a major role in Market Garden’s failure due to its tenacious defense of the Hell’s Highway corridor. An amalgamation of various second-line German formations, it was backed up by the recently raised Panzerbrigade 107, which brought a potent amount of armored firepower to the battlefield. The battlegroup’s core is composed of its varied infantry, from re-equipped SS Panzergrenadiers to various Fallschirmjäger squads, including crack veterans and inexperienced soldiers drawn from local paratrooper school units. Disheartened Luftwaffe penal troops fill the battlegroup’s ranks. Kampfgruppe Walther’s power lies with its armor, which come as numerous Panther Gs, newly introduced Panzer IV/70 tank destroyers, backed by Sd.Ffz. 251/21 with Drilling 15mm in AA and fire support roles.

Kampfgruppe Walther is a versatile battlegroup, both on the attack and defense, thanks to its powerful infantry and armored forces.

Main Features


  • Command two unique battlegroups with Nemesis #7 - Hell’s Highway in skirmish or online multiplayer: the multi-national British 43rd (Wessex) Infantry Division with its sizable Dutch and Polish detachments or the armor-heavy Kampfgruppe Walther with its new tank destroyers and a wide array of supporting infantry.
  • Command dozens of new units, such as Dutch resistance fighters and Princess Irene Brigade motorized Geweergroepen, Mariniers naval infantry detachments, Polish Spadochroniareze paratroopers, and British Assault Troops backed by Dutch-operated Lynx and Humber LRC armored scout cars, Mitchell II bombers and Spitfire Mk. XIV fighters.
  • The Germans deploy not only a smattering of re-equipped SS Panzergrenadiers but also various squads of Fallschirmjägers, including crack veterans and inexperienced soldiers drawn from local paratrooper school units, and even disheartened Luftwaffe penal troops. The freshly stood-up Panzerbrigade 107 features the new Panzer IV/70 tank destroyer and SdKfz. 251/21 with Drilling 15mm in AA and fire support roles.

short_description: Take to the fight in Nemesis 7 - Hell’s Highway with the British 43rd (Wessex) Infantry Division or Kampfgruppe Walther. Command new units such as Dutch Geweergroepen and Mariniers, Polish paratroopers, or the German Panzer IV/70, Luftwaffe penal troops, and SdKfz. 251/21 with Drilling 15mm.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
